keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: An executive memorandum President Trump signed on Saturday afternoon repeatedly referred to the Islamic State as ISIS — not ISIL, as President Barack Obama had called the terrorist group since 2014.
snippet: An executive memorandum President Trump signed on Saturday afternoon repeatedly referred to the Islamic State as ISIS — not ISIL, as President Barack Obama had called the terrorist group since 2014....

headline.main: Trump’s Plan to Fight ISIS Includes Calling It by That Name
